article_title: Caterpillar Faces Pileup of Probes and Inquiries
article_text:
A growing list of federal investigations and inquiries threatens to become a serious embarrassment for Caterpillar Inc., which has long projected a squeaky-clean Midwestern image.

The Peoria, Ill.-based maker of heavy equipment and engines faces a federal grand-jury investigation in Illinois involving cash transfers within the company and another in California focused on railcar repairs. Caterpillar has acknowledged that the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Internal Revenue Service have raised questions related...
